summary: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.
cast: Sebastian Cabot|Junius Matthews|Barbara Luddy|Howard Morris|John Fiedler|Ralph Wright|Hal Smith|Clint Howard|Bruce Reitherman|Jon Walmsley|Timothy Turner|Dori Whitaker|Sterling Holloway|Paul Winchell|Thurl Ravenscroft
director: Directors: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman | 1 more credit Â»
title: Lo mejor de Winnie the Pooh
